page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN OWERMOIGNE
page.content: HISTORICALLY THE OCCUPATIONS WERE MAINLY {AGRICULTURAL,}BUT SINCE THE SALE OF 1926 OWERMOIGNE HAS BECOME THE HOME OF A MUCH GREATER VARIETY OF PEOPLE. IT HAS NOW APPROXIMATELY 30% OF THE ADULTS RECEIVING A {PENSION}BUT TODAY ONLY 7% WORK IN{AGRICULTURE.} OTHER LEADING OCCUPATIONS ARE{ {NURSES,ENGINEERS,SHOP AND GARDEN {CENTRE WORKERS,CLERICAL OFFICERS AND {THE PROFESSIONAL OCCUPATIONS.}MOST PEOPLE WORK IN DORCHESTER,OWERMOIGNE AND AREA,OR WEYMOUTH,BUT BOVINGTON ARMY CAMP AND WINFRITH ATOMIC ENERGY RESEARCH ESTABLISHMENT,AND WAREHAM ARE ALSO IMPORTANT.FROM OUR SURVEY WE FOUND THAT 20% OF OUR INHABITANTS WERE{BORN}WITHIN 8 MILES OF OWERMOIGNE,SOME OF THEM HAVING LIVED IN OWERMOIGNE FOR GENERATIONS,OTHERS CAME FROM OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY.
